ValidationRule.description: User except below profiles can't change the Partner Support ticket owner
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND (RecordType.DeveloperName=='PS_Partner_Support', ISCHANGED(OwnerId), OR( AND ( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "Global Process Admin Profile", $Profile.Name <> "Nokia Admin Profile")), BEGINS(PRIORVALUE(OwnerId) , '005') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You Are Not Allowed To Change Owner On Partner Support Ticket
